name: iDevPatcher
subtitle: Collection of IPA files I've shared on my TikTok account, @hyper_astear.17
description: Welcome to iDevicePatcher! This repository is a collection of IPA files I've shared on my TikTok account, @hyper_astear.17. You can use the links provided here to directly install these files using TrollStore without needing to mess with Drive links.
